attributes.action: Give SIA door supervisors the power of arrest and detainment
attributes.additional_details:
What Special Power Of Arrest Do Security Operatives?

For the purpose of this article a security operative is a security guard or door supervisor. In this article I am going to touch on the power to arrest an individual that a security guard or door supervisor has. Please note this is not a special power that security guards or door supervisors have.
attributes.background: Justifying the power of arrest for security operatives
